sentences.en: " Never mind; you'll see, when we get to the Widow Douglas '. "
sentences.cn: “ 别问了, 等到了寡妇家就知道了. ”

sentences.en: "I tell you the truth," he said, "this poor widow has put in more than all the others.
sentences.cn: “我实话告诉你”，耶稣说道，“这个贫穷的寡妇放入的比其他人的都多。

sentences.en: "You said she was a poor widow lady!" — "In a manner of speaking she is," Alison said.
sentences.cn: “你说过她是个可怜的寡妇！”——“从某种意义上说，她就是，”艾利森说。

sentences.en: A buxom widow must be either married , buried or shut up in a convent.
sentences.cn: 寡妇门前是非多.

sentences.en: a wealthy widow
sentences.cn: 富孀

sentences.en: All this money was appropriated for the support of his widow.
sentences.cn: 所有这些钱作为给他的遗孀的抚养费.

sentences.en: an elderly widow who was attacked and robbed last month
sentences.cn: 上个月遭到行凶抢劫的一位寡居老妇

sentences.en: Don't feel ashamed — we don't despise the widow's mite , and, as they say, every penny helps.
sentences.cn: 不用觉得不好意思——我们不会瞧不起微薄但可贵的捐赠的, 正如人们说的, 每一文钱都会起作用.

sentences.en: For forty - eight hours the widow hunted for him everywhere in great distress.
sentences.cn: 寡妇急得要命,四处去找他,找了整整有两天两夜.

sentences.en: His widow has taken over the running of his empire, including six London theatres.
sentences.cn: 他的遗孀已接手管理他创下的帝国，其中包括6家伦敦剧院。

sentences.en: Martha was a very rich young widow.
sentences.cn: 玛莎是个很有钱的年轻寡妇.

sentences.en: Not for nothing was the plane called "The widow-maker"
sentences.cn: 这种飞机被称作“寡妇机”是事出有因的。

sentences.en: She's a widow now.
sentences.cn: 她现在是寡妇。

sentences.en: Since his death in 1985 his widow has carried the torch of his Stalinist legacy.
sentences.cn: 自从他1985年去世以来，他的遗孀一直致力于保存和发扬他的斯大林主义遗产。

sentences.en: Some villains robbed the widow of the savings.
sentences.cn: 有几个歹徒将寡妇的积蓄劫走了.

sentences.en: The sorrowful widow begged for mercy.
sentences.cn: 伤心的寡妇乞怜。

sentences.en: The widow gossiped about her neighbors.
sentences.cn: 这个寡妇说邻居的闲话了.

sentences.en: The widow is in possession of a large fortune.
sentences.cn: 那个寡妇占有大笔财产.

sentences.en: The widow's heart was surcharged with grief.
sentences.cn: 那寡妇的心过分忧伤.

sentences.en: Tony hobnobbed with an attractive widow when he lived in Metz.
sentences.cn: 托尼在梅斯居住期间曾与一名漂亮的寡妇交往甚密。

phrases.tran_cn: 离婚的女子；被抛弃的女子

trans.tran_en: a woman whose husband has died and who has not married again
